title: Curriculum on AI To Be Introduced in All Schools from Class 3 Onwards: MoE
description: The Ministry of Education's Department of School Education & Literacy (DoSE&L) announced the integration of Artificial Intelligence and Computational Thinking (AI & CT) into the school curriculum, starting from Grade 3 in the 2026-27 academic session.
content:
The Department of School Education & Literacy (DoSE&L), Ministry of Education, has reaffirmed its commitment to advancing Artificial Intelligence and Computational Thinking (AI & CT) as essential components of future-ready education.

title: Meta drops 12% as heightened AI spending overshadows strong results
description: Meta's results raised skepticism over the payoff from its aggressive artificial intelligence spending plans and overshadowed strong results.
content:
Meta Platforms ' stock dropped more than 12% Thursday as skepticism about the payoff from its aggressive artificial intelligence spending plans overshadowed strong results.

title: Mistake-Filled Legal Briefs Show the Limits of Relying on AI Tools at Work
description: NEW YORK (AP) — Judges around the world are dealing with a growing problem: legal briefs that were generated with the help of artificial intelligence and submitted with errors such as citations to cases that don’t exist, according to attorneys and court documents.

title: CBSE forms panel headed by IIT Madras professor to develop AI curriculum for schools
description: The Central Board of Secondary Education has constituted an expert committee chaired by an IIT Madras professor to develop the curriculum for Artificial Intelligence and Computational Thinking AI CT, officials said. The CBSE has constituted an expert committee chaired by Karthik Raman, Professor, Department of Data Science and AI, IIT Madras, to develop the AI CT curriculum, said School Education Secretary Sanjay Kumar.
content: The Central Board of Secondary Education has constituted an expert committee chaired by an IIT Madras professor to develop the curriculum for Artificial Intelligence and Computational Thinking (AI & CT), officials said. The move comes following the p... [1573 chars]

title: Microsoft continues to add AI capacity as analysts expect Azure to accelerate
description: Microsoft (MSFT) produced year-over-year revenue growth of more than 18% for the second consecutive quarter as analysts point out the company's buildout of more artificial intelligence capacity is a sign of accelerating Azure growth.
content:
Microsoft continues to add AI capacity as analysts expect Azure to accelerate

title: Google join hands to build India’s AI infrastructure and broaden access
description: Reliance and Google announce a wide-ranging AI partnership spanning consumers, enterprises, and compute—aiming to make artificial intelligence more accessible and build India’s digital AI backbone.
